job_title: Content & WA Director in Ciudad de Mexico
pros: Expertise, feed back, freedom of been creative and impact the world

job_title: Project Manager in Ciudad de Mexico
pros: The mission is super inspiring. It connects and encourages everyone to jump in. All members are super passionate about it. You genuinely feel like you are changing the world
cons: The culture is hard to get. Everyone is delayed all the time. As global organization teams are still working in silos. There is no tech structure on data. A lot of pressure and it's hard to get resources. Global leaders are too far away from reality on the ground.
